channel.title: I've an Extra Codec
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I've an Extra Codec"

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: Well, it makes no sense for me to just hold onto it. I'll drop it in the storehouse, and Uzuki can give it to whomever.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: Really? I had the exact opposite problem. I used to play a RedEye alt named Genzou, but he progressed so freakin' slowly. He took, like, 10 times longer to get a Soul Glove, he was even more unlucky at the prize wheel than my main (which I didn't think was even possible), he kept failing missions that he should have had a 70-80 percent win rate on, ectâ€¦ He finally became a Special Jonin at level 38 (after failing the test once), just after becoming a reaper (and I still hadn't gotten a soul candy). It was pissing me off how unbelievably unlucky my alt was, so I stopped using him.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: Thats why I refuse to play an alt. I know he would advance faster than my main, and that would just piss me off.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: I only do 6 or 7 spins a day, but I make sure to always have Billy with me. I usually break about even with getting Ninja Puppets/Dogs.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: That's just the RNG monster hating you. My primary character (Fax) has yet to win a super rare on the prize wheel. My alt (Xochitl) has won a Necklace of the First HoCage, K-Dog's Headband, and has pulled the +1m ryo for the village super-rare twice. It makes no sense.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: I play 5 or so times when the rare isn't a permanent item. I kill all my ryo when there is one, hell i even sell off things for extra spins. I haven't won yet :<

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded: I dunno about him, but I burn my cash down to the ground every night on the prize wheel.

item.title: Re: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded:
I wish I had something to trade you, if i happen to win 2 k-dog headbands today i'll let you know. :>

EDIT: How often are you playing the prize wheel to get these super rares?

item.title: I've an Extra Codec
item.content:encoded:
I've an extra Codec. Is there anyone who can trade me something nice for it? I've already got the following, and would really like a K-Dog Headband or Necklace of the HoCage.

Heck Butterfly
Soul Glove
Professor's Hat
Ninja Puppet
Ninja Dog
Dog Collar
Chakra Armor
Trench Knife
Desert Robes
Giant Fan
Blue Flower Hairpin
Glowing Mood Ring
Swallowtail Butterfly
